sn4.8:1: Thus have I heard. On one occasion the Blessed One was dwelling at Sāvatthī in Jeta's Grove, Anāthapiṇḍika's Park.
sn4.8:2: v.461"One who has sons delights in sons,One with cattle delights in cattle.sn.i.108Acquisitions truly are a man's delight;Without acquisitions one does not delight."
sn4.8:3: v.462"One who has sons sorrows over sons,One with cattle sorrows over cattle.Acquisitions truly are a man's sorrow;Without acquisitions one does not sorrow."
sn4.8:4: Then Māra the Evil One … disappeared right there.
